snippet: An Egyptian court has overturned the death sentence of the only police officer convicted of killing protesters during the uprising that forced President Hosni Mubarak to step down last year.
abstract: Egyptian court overturns the death sentence of Mohammed Abdel-Moneim, the only police officer convicted of killing protesters during the uprising that forced Pres Hosni Mubarak to step down in 2011.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court has overturned the death sentence of the only police officer convicted of killing protesters during the uprising that forced President Hosni Mubarak to step down last year.

headline.main: Egypt: Court Overturns Death Sentence of Officer
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Court Overturns Death Sentence Of Officer in Killings During Uprising

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
